content.rendered:
Directed by Lisa Matthews. Catherine Millar.

Written by Fiona Seres.

Cast Nicole da Silva (Simone). Noni Hazlehurst. Damien Strouthos (Mark). Jillian Nguyen. Erroll Shand. Jude Hyland (Arthur). Kat Stewart (Vicki). Les Hill (Detective Clemens). Wadih Dona (Baris). Tina Bursill (Helen). George Mason (Joely Calley). William Zappa (Don). Fiona Press (Laura). Harrison Pearse (Joel). Ana Thu Nguyen (Rose)

Language English.

Producers Emily Ballou. Ian Collie. Harriet Creelman. Rob Gibson. Ally Henville. Simon Maxwell. Series Cinematography by. Garry Phillips. Series Makeup Department. Sheldon Wade.

Production Easy Tiger Productions. Paramount+. Screen Australia.

No. of Seasons 1

No. of Episodes 6

Status On Going (2023–)
